title: Fragment of a Decorative Border
artistDisplayName:
Nazca
Possibly Coyungo, Nasca Valley, south coast, Peru
medium: Cotton, plain weave; embroidered with wool (camelid) in cross-knit loop stitches; extensions in buttonhole stitches overworked with cross-knit loop stitches
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Purchased with funds provided by Mrs. Chauncey B. Borland
